data.text:
@Dking002 @Fla_Pol @AP Listen here, clown. I am not afraid of a needle. 
YOU, by encouraging children to get a shot they DO NOT NEED are showing YOUR fears.
@BlairDMckee @Fla_Pol @AP It's a needle sweetie. Stop sheltering your children. That's how they grow up to be conservatives and scared of needles.
@cassiepena5 @Fla_Pol @AP Protecting children from what? A proven safe and effective life saving vaccine?!?!?. Why do you hate your children?????

@Dking002 @Fla_Pol @AP Of children. Children are at incredibly low risk from Covid; always have been. And yet you clowns are scared of them. Democrats wrecked two full school years to protect adults from children.
@Amor_Virtus @Fla_Pol @AP With or from covid? Big difference
@Fla_Pol @AP Love our Governor. My healthy child will NOT receive this poison.
@Dking002 @Fla_Pol @AP They are PROTECTING children. If you want the jab get it. Don't force it on my or my family. You have bigger issues, your idiot in residence.

@Fla_Pol @AP Our drool-flecked, science-denying, moron of a governor pandered to his addle-brained, conspiracy riddled base by hiring a quack for state Surgeon General. We’re already paying the price for DeSantis’ anti-vax extremism. Note the difference between FL and CA. https://t.co/KeoeWn2vFa
@BlairDMckee @Fla_Pol @AP Of what? A neddle??? No but Republicans seem to be. When did our country get so soft?
